title: A Gravel Gamble: What Does Joining the UCI Gravel World Series Mean For a Grassroots Race?
content:
Two-time Unbound winner Amanda Nauman and her partner David Sheek founded Mammoth Tuff in 2022 and have struggled with participation numbers since. Next year, they're trying something different.

Read the full article at A Gravel Gamble: What Does Joining the UCI Gravel World Series Mean For a Grassroots Race? on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
